# Drawing Reference Complete reference for Vista Graphics drawing commands and primitives. ## Drawing Categories - [Primitives](/wiki/graphics/drawing/primitives/) - Line, box, circle, ellipse - [Polygons](/wiki/graphics/drawing/polygons/) - Polygon drawing - [Paths](/wiki/graphics/drawing/paths/) - Path operations - [Pen & Fill](/wiki/graphics/drawing/pen-fill/) - Pen and fill styles ## Basic Drawing `draw canvas [ line 0 0 100 100 box 10 10 100 100 circle 50 50 25 ellipse 150 50 30 50 ]` ## See Also - [Tutorials](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/) - Learning guides - [Colors](/wiki/graphics/colors/) - Color and gradient reference
